full_summary:
### Notice of Request for Proposal
#### #W2037-24-0177: Telescope and Scientific Equipment Acquisition

**Trade Agreement:**
The procurement is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Procurement Strategy:**
Competitive, Selective tendering with evaluation criteria based on the lowest compliant cost.

**Eligibility:**
This Request for Proposal (RFP) is open to holders of the Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

**Background:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals for the acquisition of one (1) telescope as part of its masonry laboratory equipment requirements.

**Overview:**
The RFP invites seven pre-qualified suppliers, including Agilent Technologies, Delta Photonics Inc., EGE Consultant, Fisher Scientific, High Speed Imaging, Safe Leaf Extract Solutions Inc., and VWR International Ltd., to submit a bid.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The successful bidder will be determined based on the lowest compliant cost, with a mandatory technical requirement.

**Proposal Submission:**
Invited suppliers must submit a proposal in accordance with the solicitation documents. Failure to do so may result in disqualification.

**Important Notes:**

* Suppliers must hold a valid Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI with PWGSC.
* Suppliers should refer to the solicitation documents for any queries regarding the RFP.
* The DND reserves the right to accept or reject any or all proposals without providing a reason.

**Clarification and Inquiries:**
For any inquiries or clarification regarding this RFP, please contact Aaron Pound, Contracting Authority at [Aaron.Pound@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Aaron.Pound@forces.gc.ca) or (506) 422-2000 ext 7891.

**Timeline:**
The tender closing date is February 16, 2024, at 13:00:00.

**CANADIAN FREE TRADE AGREEMENT (CFTA) ADVANTAGE:**
This procurement benefits from the CFTA, which aims to reduce trade barriers and promote economic growth. The CFTA agreement enables qualified suppliers from participating provinces and territories to bid on any contract valued over $ 275,000.
